titles.title: To extend the suspension of duty on 5-amino-N-(2-hydroxyethyl)-2,3-xylenesulfonamide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/11/2001--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2004, the suspension of duty on a specified chemical.
